headline: A Look At Aptiv (APTV) Valuation After Earnings Guidance And Buyback Update
summary: Aptiv (APTV) shares were in focus after the company paired its fourth quarter 2025 results with fresh earnings guidance for 2026 and confirmed substantial progress on its multi year share repurchase program. See our latest analysis for Aptiv. Those quarterly results, fresh 2026 guidance and the confirmation of a large buyback update came as Aptiv’s share price reached $85.20, with a 90 day share price return of 7.97% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 27.16%.
